description: React component implementing a Tic Tac Toe game with session scores, game state management, and user interface controls.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board state for a winner or draw.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells, updating game state and checking for win/draw.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board to start a new round.

methods.name: resetScores
methods.description: Resets the session scores for players and draws.
